info.author: Marcel Hellkamp
classifiers: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.description:
Bottle is a fast and simple micro-framework for small web applications. It
offers request dispatching (Routes) with URL parameter support, templates,
a built-in HTTP Server and adapters for many third party WSGI/HTTP-server and
template engines - all in a single file and with no dependencies other than the
Python Standard Library.

Homepage and documentation: http://bottlepy.org/

Copyright (c) 2015, Marcel Hellkamp.
License: MIT (see LICENSE for details)
info.name: ewer
info.summary: Async Fork of Fast and simple WSGI-framework for small web-applications.

Bottle is a fast and simple micro-framework for small web applications.
